subject: Steroids
Human Growth Hormone
lead_paragraph: In his first public comments about the Mitchell report, Chuck Knoblauch said that he was not angry about being named in the report, but did not explicitly admit that he had used H.G.H.
snippet: In his first public comments about the Mitchell report, Chuck Knoblauch said that he was not angry about being named in the report, but did not explicitly admit that he had used H.G.H.
